ProductInfo.Features:
Operating System: Embedded LINUX
System Resources: Pentaplex opera tion (Multi-channel real-time recording/ Playback/ Network viewing/ USB backup)
Control Interface: On screen display/ IR remote/ USB mouse
Menu Display: 1 / 4 screen
Video Standards: PAL (625 lines @ 50FPS); NTSC ( 525 lines @ 60FPS)
Video Recording: D1: PAL 1 FPS - 25FPS per channel; NTSC 1 FPS-30FPS per channel
Recording FPS: PAL @ 100 FPS Total / NTSC @ 120 FPS Total
Motion Detection: Zones: 396 (22 x 18) detection zones, Sensitivity: 1-6
Audio Compression: G711A
Bidirectional Talk: Support
Recording Mode: Manual/ Alarm/ Dynamic Detection/ Schedule
Playback: 1CH/ 4CH
Search Mode: Time/ Event search
HDD Consumption: Audio: 28.8MB per hour / Video: 25-450MB per hour
Video Storage: Hard disk/ Network
Backup Mode: Network download / USB/ SATA HDD
Video Input: 4CH BNC
Video Output: BNC X 2/ VGA X I
Audio Input: 1CH RCA
Audio Output: 1CH RCA
Network Interface: Ethenet 10M/100M (RJ45)
USB Interface: 2 port
USB Interface: 2 port
Hard Disk Drive: SATA port / Support up to 2TB (2000G B)
Power Consumption: 12V/2A
